text: Diego Alejandro Silva Fuentes (born 11 March 1983) is a Chilean footballer currently playing for Primera B side Deportes Santa Cruz. ==External links== * BDFA Profile Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Cobresal footballers Category:Cobreloa footballers Category:Santiago Morning footballers Category:San Luis de Quillota footballers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Diego Alejandro Silva
